item.title: Canva + Pictory video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a creative individual to join our team and help bring our scripts to life through captivating video content. While experience with Canva and Pictory is beneficial, it is not required; we provide comprehensive training from scratch. Our company specializes in creating engaging educational content and we are committed to fostering talent and creativity.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the team to transform text scripts into visually appealing video content.
Utilize Canva and Pictory tools to enhance the visual storytelling process.
Meet project deadlines and communicate effectively with the team.

Requirements:

Strong passion for visual storytelling and creativity.
Willingness to learn and develop skills in video creation using Canva and Pictory.
Ability to effectively communicate ideas and collaborate with team members.
Previous experience in graphic design or video editing is a plus but not required.

Conditions:

Flexible work schedule to accommodate learning and skill development.
Remote work opportunity with the possibility of occasional team meetings.
Comprehensive training provided to learn Canva and Pictory tools from scratch.

If you're eager to embark on a journey of creativity and learning, we invite you to join our team! Submit your portfolio and a brief resume to apply.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Canva, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Canva, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Tragic Stories Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our team for a YouTube channel dedicated to tragic stories. As a video editor, you will be responsible for creating engaging and compelling video content that aligns with our channel's theme. This will involve editing raw footage, adding special effects, transitions, and captions, and ensuring a seamless final product.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of storytelling and pacing
  - Ability to work with various video formats and codecs
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Knowledge of YouTube platform and best practices

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months, with the potential for long-term collaboration for the right candidate. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor with prior experience in editing tragic stories or similar content.

  If you are passionate about storytelling through video editing and have the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you!

Apply only with examples in that niche!
Here is example of what we need
https://www.youtube.com/@TragicStoriesYT

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Armenia
click to apply

item.title: Product Photos and Short Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are an online retailer specializing in home products. We’re seeking a talented freelance photo and video editor for a long-term collaboration to create compelling visuals and enhance our online presence. If you are passionate about design and want to be part of our dynamic team, we’d love to hear from you!
Responsibilities:
• Edit product images and videos to meet our brand standards.
• Optimize visuals for web and social media platforms.
• Collaborate with our marketing team to create engaging content.
• Maintain consistency across all visual assets.
Requirements:
• Proficiency in photo and video editing software.
• Strong attention to detail and creativity.
• Images and Video Captions shall be in both Spanish and Portuguese, no need for Bilingual proficiency in Spanish and Portuguese, translations can be provided.

item.title: HTML video player example with audio and video channels switching - Upwork
item.description:
Hello

We need a small HTML page test example with web video player integrated that playing a movie with possibilities to switch audio channels (different languages) and video qualities (4K, HD, 720, 340, 280)

We need someone to:

1. Find the best suitable web video player for this (preferably open source and free)
2. Explain us how it works: can we use a single video file (preferably) or should we use multiple audio and video files
3. Tell us what video editor can we use on PC in order to convert different formats of video/audio in the format we need for your provided HTL example
4. Create a simple HTML page with video file and integrated web player that can perform all listed options.
5. The player should be supported in most browsers and platforms (PC/mobile and different OS)

An example of such player:

https://hdrezka.ag/films/melodrama/755-titanik-1997.html

Regards

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:04 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:HTML5, JavaScript, Video Editing
Skills: HTML5, JavaScript, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Course Editor for On-Demand Courses - US-Based HR Consultancy Firm (Samples Required) - Upwork
item.description:
Only applicants who apply via Upwork will be considered. No Calls and No Emails!

About Hasil Consulting:
Hasil Consulting is a dynamic professional services firm empowering organizations through comprehensive human resources and leadership development services. With a rich history of partnering with small businesses, non-profits, and government agencies, we are committed to fostering workplace innovation and delivering tailored solutions. Our expertise spans Organizational and Human Resources Support, Recruitment Strategy, Leadership Coaching, and Professional Development Training, aiming to drive meaningful change and enhance organizational effectiveness.

About the Content and Script Developer Position:
We are seeking skilled and responsible individuals to edit video courses for us. As a video course editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing the quality of our video courses. This includes trimming and combining video footage, adding captions and graphics, and ensuring a smooth flow and continuity. We seek someone with experience in video editing software and a solid attention to detail.

You will be responsible for editing 25 videos ranging from 3 to 10 minutes. We will have the script ready for you to use with visual ques for editing.

Your Experience
- Proficient in video editing software
- Attention to detail
- Strong time management skills
- Creativity

BONUS: Experience within the human resources or government sectors would be advantageous but is not mandatory. The role demands a collaborative work style, allowing for independent project management and effective teamwork. Proficiency in content creation tools and a capacity to adapt content for various multimedia formats are also required.

Please include samples of your work in your proposal submission.

We want to hear from you if you have a creative eye, excellent time management skills, and can work independently!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor required for Reels. - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor (Monthly Basis - 30 Videos)
Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to join our team on a monthly basis. The primary responsibility of the Video Editor will be to edit 30 videos each month, ensuring high-quality production that meets our standards. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video editing, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to deliver polished and engaging content consistently.

Responsibilities:

Edit 30 videos per month according to the provided guidelines and requirements.
Collaborate with the team to understand the vision and goals for each video project.
Ensure videos are edited to a high standard, including color correction, audio enhancement, and the addition of graphics, animations, and transitions.
Maintain consistency and continuity across all video content.
Work with various video formats and resolutions, ensuring the final output is optimized for different platforms (YouTube, social media, etc.).
Meet deadlines and manage time effectively to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
Implement feedback from the team to refine and improve video content.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your editing skills.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar.
Strong understanding of video production techniques, including color grading, sound editing, and motion graphics.
Excellent attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics and visual storytelling.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and clients.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and handle multiple projects efficiently.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with various video styles and formats (vlogs, tutorials, promotional videos, etc.).
Familiarity with social media platforms and video requirements for each (e.g., YouTube, Instagram, Facebook).
Basic knowledge of graphic design and animation.
How to Apply:

If you are a creative and dedicated Video Editor who meets the above requirements, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator for Motivational TikTok Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am pleased to present our comprehensive video project designed to inspire and engage our audience through a series of compelling themes over the next 16 weeks. This initiative aims to deliver impactful content that resonates on personal and professional levels.

**Project Scope:**
Over the course of 16 weeks, we will produce a total of 48 short videos, organized into thematic weeks focusing on personal growth, leadership, mindfulness, and more. Each video will employ a mix of live-action footage, animated sequences, and creative text overlays, enhanced by carefully curated soundtracks.

**Approach:**
Each thematic week will feature three distinct videos, each lasting between 20 to 30 seconds to maximize engagement. The content is meticulously crafted, leveraging clear voiceover scripts to convey each theme effectively and emotionally.

**Content Preview: First Month**
Below is the content outline for the initial month, showcasing the themes and topics we will explore. Videos for each week are scheduled to be delivered on the Sunday prior to the start of the respective week, with payment processed the Monday following delivery:

Week 1: Inspirational Quotes

- **1. Title:** "Anchor of Hope"
  - **Subtitle:** "Hope is the anchor of the soul." – Hebrews 6:19
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Hope is the anchor of the soul." (Large, bold)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Amidst life's challenges, hope serves as our steadfast anchor, guiding us through turbulent waters."
  - **Background:** Serene landscapes from drone footage
  - **Soundtrack:** Gentle piano music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Soft tones for a calming effect.
    - **Text Animation:** Fading in and out for text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **2. Title:** "Overcoming Obstacles"
  - **Subtitle:** "Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it."
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Although the world is full of suffering," (Medium)
    - "it is also full of the overcoming of it." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "In every adversity, we find resilience, turning challenges into triumphs."
  - **Background:** Animated scenes of overcoming obstacles
  - **Soundtrack:** Inspiring orchestral music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** High contrast for visibility.
    - **Text Animation:** Sliding or scaling text animation.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **3. Title:** "Leadership in Service"
  - **Subtitle:** "True leadership is about serving others."
  - **Source Attribution:** John Maxwell
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "True leadership is about serving others." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Leadership transcends authority; it's about compassionately serving those we lead."
  - **Background:** Scenes depicting leadership and service
  - **Soundtrack:** Motivating beat
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear contrast with the background.
    - **Text Animation:** Subtle fade in and out.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 2: Faith-Based Messages

- **4. Title:** "Trusting God's Plan"
  - **Subtitle:** "In times of uncertainty, trust in God’s plan."
  - **Source Attribution:** Corrie ten Boom
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "In times of uncertainty, trust in God’s plan." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Faith guides us through uncertainty, illuminating paths we might otherwise overlook."
  - **Background:** Mix of live-action and serene landscapes
  - **Soundtrack:** Soothing choir music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Warm tones for spiritual reflection.
    - **Text Animation:** Subtle transitions between text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **5. Title:** "Love and Service"
  - **Subtitle:** "We have been created for greater things— to love and to be loved."
  - **Source Attribution:** Mother Teresa
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "We have been created for greater things—" (Medium)
    - "to love and to be loved." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Our purpose unfolds in acts of love and service, enriching lives with compassion and kindness."
  - **Background:** Blend of animation and still images depicting love and service
  - **Soundtrack:** Inspirational orchestral music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Soft and inviting colors.
    - **Text Animation:** Creative use of dynamic transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **6. Title:** "Wisdom in Business"
  - **Subtitle:** "Wisdom is knowing the right path to take. Integrity is taking it."
  - **Source Attribution:** Myles Munroe
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Wisdom is knowing the right path to take." (Medium)
    - "Integrity is taking it." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Navigating business with wisdom and integrity shapes a legacy of trust and ethical leadership."
  - **Background:** Combination of live-action and animated business settings
  - **Soundtrack:** Motivational beats with a hint of professionalism
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Professional and clear for business context.
    - **Text Animation:** Smooth transitions between text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 3: Leadership Insights

- **7. Title:** "Empowering Others"
  - **Subtitle:** "Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge."
  - **Source Attribution:** Simon Sinek
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Leadership is not about being in charge." (Medium)
    - "It's about taking care of those in your charge." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Empowering others is the essence of leadership, fostering growth and collaboration."
  - **Background:** Dynamic mix of live-action and motivational scenes
  - **Soundtrack:** Upbeat and inspiring instrumental
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Bold and inspiring for leadership themes.
    - **Text Animation:** Dynamic text movements to enhance engagement.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **8. Title:** "Visionary Leadership"
  - **Subtitle:** "A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way."
  - **Source Attribution:** John C. Maxwell
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "A leader is one who knows the way," (Medium)
    - "goes the way, and shows the way." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Visionary leadership inspires and guides, paving the way for success and innovation."
  - **Background:** Combination of animated visionary concepts and real-world leadership moments
  - **Soundtrack:** Energetic and forward-thinking music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear and authoritative for leadership messages.
    - **Text Animation:** Progressive transitions to emphasize leadership qualities.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **9. Title:** "Team Collaboration"
  - **Subtitle:** "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much."
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Alone we can do so little;" (Medium)
    - "together we can do so much." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Effective leadership nurtures collaboration, uniting diverse talents toward shared goals."
  - **Background:** Blend of live-action teamwork and animated collaboration scenarios
  - **Soundtrack:** Uplifting and collaborative music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Harmonious and team-oriented hues.
    - **Text Animation:** Seamless transitions to reflect teamwork.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 4: Business Integrity

- **10. Title:** "Ethics in Action"
  - **Subtitle:** "Ethics is not about rules. It's about integrity."
  - **Source Attribution:** Peter Drucker
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Ethics is not about rules." (Medium)
    - "It's about integrity." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Integrity in business defines our decisions and actions, shaping trust and reputation."
  - **Background:** Live-action and animated sequences depicting ethical business practices
  - **Soundtrack:** Professional and trustworthy tones
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear and trustworthy for ethical messaging.
    - **Text Animation:** Ethical and seamless transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **11. Title:** "Innovation and Leadership"
  - **Subtitle:** "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower."
  - **Source Attribution:** Steve Jobs
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Leadership thrives on innovation, driving progress and staying ahead of the curve."
  - **Background:** Mix of live-action innovation hubs and animated futuristic concepts
  - **Soundtrack:** Futuristic and innovative music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Bold and forward-thinking for innovation themes.
    - **Text Animation:** Dynamic and modern transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **12. Title:** "Customer-Centric Strategy"
  - **Subtitle:** "Putting the customer first is a timeless business strategy."
  - **Source Attribution:** Michael LeBoeuf
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Putting the customer first is a timeless business strategy." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Success in business hinges on understanding and serving our customers' needs."
  - **Background:** Live-action customer interactions and animated customer-centric solutions
  - **Soundtrack:** Customer-focused and engaging music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Customer-centric and inviting hues.
    - **Text Animation:** Smooth and customer-friendly transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

**Potential Expansion:**
Starting from Week 5, depending on the success and engagement of the initial weeks, we may explore increasing the number of videos per week to four or five. This expansion aims to further enrich our content offerings and cater to a broader range of viewer interests.

**Design and Creative Elements:**
Our approach incorporates dynamic transitions, creative text animations, and a variety of visual styles to maintain viewer interest and clarity. Each video is designed not only to inform but also to inspire, creating a meaningful connection with our audience.

**Business Proposal Request:**
I request proposals based on each weekly set of three videos. Assuming our requirements are met satisfactorily, this project has the potential to continue for up to 12 months.

**Business Proposal Terms:**
To ensure quality and alignment with our goals, we require potential videography partners to provide samples of previous work for review. Payment terms will be weekly, with deliverables provided in batches of three videos by the Sunday before the new week begins. Payment will be processed on the Monday following delivery.

This project operates on a week-to-week basis to allow for flexibility and alignment with evolving strategic priorities. However, we reserve the right to terminate the project if deliverables do not meet our expectations.

**Conclusion:**
We are excited about this project and confident in its ability to deliver valuable content that resonates with our audience. We look forward to your feedback and collaboration as we embark on this journey together.

item.ns0:encoded:
I am pleased to present our comprehensive video project designed to inspire and engage our audience through a series of compelling themes over the next 16 weeks. This initiative aims to deliver impactful content that resonates on personal and professional levels.

**Project Scope:**
Over the course of 16 weeks, we will produce a total of 48 short videos, organized into thematic weeks focusing on personal growth, leadership, mindfulness, and more. Each video will employ a mix of live-action footage, animated sequences, and creative text overlays, enhanced by carefully curated soundtracks.

**Approach:**
Each thematic week will feature three distinct videos, each lasting between 20 to 30 seconds to maximize engagement. The content is meticulously crafted, leveraging clear voiceover scripts to convey each theme effectively and emotionally.

**Content Preview: First Month**
Below is the content outline for the initial month, showcasing the themes and topics we will explore. Videos for each week are scheduled to be delivered on the Sunday prior to the start of the respective week, with payment processed the Monday following delivery:

Week 1: Inspirational Quotes

- **1. Title:** "Anchor of Hope"
  - **Subtitle:** "Hope is the anchor of the soul." – Hebrews 6:19
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Hope is the anchor of the soul." (Large, bold)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Amidst life's challenges, hope serves as our steadfast anchor, guiding us through turbulent waters."
  - **Background:** Serene landscapes from drone footage
  - **Soundtrack:** Gentle piano music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Soft tones for a calming effect.
    - **Text Animation:** Fading in and out for text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **2. Title:** "Overcoming Obstacles"
  - **Subtitle:** "Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it."
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Although the world is full of suffering," (Medium)
    - "it is also full of the overcoming of it." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "In every adversity, we find resilience, turning challenges into triumphs."
  - **Background:** Animated scenes of overcoming obstacles
  - **Soundtrack:** Inspiring orchestral music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** High contrast for visibility.
    - **Text Animation:** Sliding or scaling text animation.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **3. Title:** "Leadership in Service"
  - **Subtitle:** "True leadership is about serving others."
  - **Source Attribution:** John Maxwell
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "True leadership is about serving others." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Leadership transcends authority; it's about compassionately serving those we lead."
  - **Background:** Scenes depicting leadership and service
  - **Soundtrack:** Motivating beat
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear contrast with the background.
    - **Text Animation:** Subtle fade in and out.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 2: Faith-Based Messages

- **4. Title:** "Trusting God's Plan"
  - **Subtitle:** "In times of uncertainty, trust in God’s plan."
  - **Source Attribution:** Corrie ten Boom
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "In times of uncertainty, trust in God’s plan." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Faith guides us through uncertainty, illuminating paths we might otherwise overlook."
  - **Background:** Mix of live-action and serene landscapes
  - **Soundtrack:** Soothing choir music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Warm tones for spiritual reflection.
    - **Text Animation:** Subtle transitions between text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **5. Title:** "Love and Service"
  - **Subtitle:** "We have been created for greater things— to love and to be loved."
  - **Source Attribution:** Mother Teresa
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "We have been created for greater things—" (Medium)
    - "to love and to be loved." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Our purpose unfolds in acts of love and service, enriching lives with compassion and kindness."
  - **Background:** Blend of animation and still images depicting love and service
  - **Soundtrack:** Inspirational orchestral music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Soft and inviting colors.
    - **Text Animation:** Creative use of dynamic transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **6. Title:** "Wisdom in Business"
  - **Subtitle:** "Wisdom is knowing the right path to take. Integrity is taking it."
  - **Source Attribution:** Myles Munroe
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Wisdom is knowing the right path to take." (Medium)
    - "Integrity is taking it." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Navigating business with wisdom and integrity shapes a legacy of trust and ethical leadership."
  - **Background:** Combination of live-action and animated business settings
  - **Soundtrack:** Motivational beats with a hint of professionalism
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Professional and clear for business context.
    - **Text Animation:** Smooth transitions between text overlays.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 3: Leadership Insights

- **7. Title:** "Empowering Others"
  - **Subtitle:** "Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge."
  - **Source Attribution:** Simon Sinek
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Leadership is not about being in charge." (Medium)
    - "It's about taking care of those in your charge." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Empowering others is the essence of leadership, fostering growth and collaboration."
  - **Background:** Dynamic mix of live-action and motivational scenes
  - **Soundtrack:** Upbeat and inspiring instrumental
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Bold and inspiring for leadership themes.
    - **Text Animation:** Dynamic text movements to enhance engagement.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **8. Title:** "Visionary Leadership"
  - **Subtitle:** "A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way."
  - **Source Attribution:** John C. Maxwell
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "A leader is one who knows the way," (Medium)
    - "goes the way, and shows the way." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Visionary leadership inspires and guides, paving the way for success and innovation."
  - **Background:** Combination of animated visionary concepts and real-world leadership moments
  - **Soundtrack:** Energetic and forward-thinking music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear and authoritative for leadership messages.
    - **Text Animation:** Progressive transitions to emphasize leadership qualities.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **9. Title:** "Team Collaboration"
  - **Subtitle:** "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much."
  - **Source Attribution:** Helen Keller
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Alone we can do so little;" (Medium)
    - "together we can do so much." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Effective leadership nurtures collaboration, uniting diverse talents toward shared goals."
  - **Background:** Blend of live-action teamwork and animated collaboration scenarios
  - **Soundtrack:** Uplifting and collaborative music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Harmonious and team-oriented hues.
    - **Text Animation:** Seamless transitions to reflect teamwork.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

### Week 4: Business Integrity

- **10. Title:** "Ethics in Action"
  - **Subtitle:** "Ethics is not about rules. It's about integrity."
  - **Source Attribution:** Peter Drucker
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Ethics is not about rules." (Medium)
    - "It's about integrity." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Integrity in business defines our decisions and actions, shaping trust and reputation."
  - **Background:** Live-action and animated sequences depicting ethical business practices
  - **Soundtrack:** Professional and trustworthy tones
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Clear and trustworthy for ethical messaging.
    - **Text Animation:** Ethical and seamless transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **11. Title:** "Innovation and Leadership"
  - **Subtitle:** "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower."
  - **Source Attribution:** Steve Jobs
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Leadership thrives on innovation, driving progress and staying ahead of the curve."
  - **Background:** Mix of live-action innovation hubs and animated futuristic concepts
  - **Soundtrack:** Futuristic and innovative music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Bold and forward-thinking for innovation themes.
    - **Text Animation:** Dynamic and modern transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

- **12. Title:** "Customer-Centric Strategy"
  - **Subtitle:** "Putting the customer first is a timeless business strategy."
  - **Source Attribution:** Michael LeBoeuf
  - **Text Overlay:**
    - "Putting the customer first is a timeless business strategy." (Medium)
    - Sequential text display for readability.
  - **Voiceover Script:**
    - "Success in business hinges on understanding and serving our customers' needs."
  - **Background:** Live-action customer interactions and animated customer-centric solutions
  - **Soundtrack:** Customer-focused and engaging music
  - **Design Details:**
    - **Text Color:** Customer-centric and inviting hues.
    - **Text Animation:** Smooth and customer-friendly transitions.
    - **Duration:** 20-30 seconds for optimal engagement.

**Potential Expansion:**
Starting from Week 5, depending on the success and engagement of the initial weeks, we may explore increasing the number of videos per week to four or five. This expansion aims to further enrich our content offerings and cater to a broader range of viewer interests.

**Design and Creative Elements:**
Our approach incorporates dynamic transitions, creative text animations, and a variety of visual styles to maintain viewer interest and clarity. Each video is designed not only to inform but also to inspire, creating a meaningful connection with our audience.

**Business Proposal Request:**
I request proposals based on each weekly set of three videos. Assuming our requirements are met satisfactorily, this project has the potential to continue for up to 12 months.

**Business Proposal Terms:**
To ensure quality and alignment with our goals, we require potential videography partners to provide samples of previous work for review. Payment terms will be weekly, with deliverables provided in batches of three videos by the Sunday before the new week begins. Payment will be processed on the Monday following delivery.

This project operates on a week-to-week basis to allow for flexibility and alignment with evolving strategic priorities. However, we reserve the right to terminate the project if deliverables do not meet our expectations.

**Conclusion:**
We are excited about this project and confident in its ability to deliver valuable content that resonates with our audience. We look forward to your feedback and collaboration as we embark on this journey together.

We're looking for someone with the following competences:

* Fast turnaround time 24-48 hours
* Can edit the same video format, as the example channel.
* Can find source material, in the same style as example channel
* Fast response times
* Good understanding of storytelling and YouTube retention

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating Youtube shorts and long videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Youtube video trends and audience preferences. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage to create compelling and engaging videos that align with our brand's style and guidelines. You should be proficient in using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines are essential.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of Youtube video trends and audience preferences
  - Ability to edit and enhance raw footage to create engaging videos
  - Attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines

  We are a growing Youtube channel in the PC gaming and Twitch space and this is an ongoing opportunity. If you have a passion for Youtube video editing and want to join our team, please submit your portfolio showcasing your previous Youtube video editing work.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Facebook Video Ads Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Join Our Team as a Facebook Video Ads Editor!

👉Role Overview:

We're seeking a skilled and imaginative Facebook Video Ads Editor to join our marketing team. In this role, you will be responsible for creating compelling Facebook video ads that captivates audiences and drives leads on our Facebook leads campaigns. If you're passionate about storytelling through video and have a keen eye for detail, we want to hear from you!

👉Key Responsibilities:

👉Collaborate with our marketing team to develop video ad concepts that align with our brand and campaign objectives.

👉Produce high-quality video ads optimized for Facebook's ad platform, focusing on storytelling, visual appeal, and call-to-action.

👉Edit and enhance existing video content to ensure consistency with brand guidelines and messaging.

👉Requirements:

✅Proven experience in video editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work on Facebook video ads.

✅Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, or similar tools.

✅In-depth knowledge of Facebook's advertising platform and best practices for creating effective video ads.

✅Strong creative vision and the ability to translate concepts into compelling visual stories.

How to Apply:
If you're passionate about creating impactful video content and driving results through Facebook advertising, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you're the perfect fit for this role.

Don't miss this opportunity to join our team and make a meaningful impact with your creativity and expertise!


Posted On: June 26, 2024 11:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply
